text: singapore exchange  - total securities market turnover value higher by 124 year-on-year in march to s48.2 bln
singapore exchange  - total equity and debt fundraising on sgx reached s11 bln during march
singapore exchange  - march petrochemicals derivatives volume up 136 y-o-y due to heightened volatility in oil market

singapore exchange  - march total commodities derivatives volume up 76 y-o-y to 3.1 mln contracts
